name: I - Makaubos' Cutting Field / Sword Pure Land

system.description:
You unsheathe your blade and then cut a thousand times in the span of a single second.

Spend 1 Beat and attack a fighter in range 5 with the lower of your Bravery or Faith, ignoring Combo Breaker.

Slashing Lands: Spend 2 Beats to instead attack all fighters in an area (range 4 burst 1) with Faith and then leave behind a burst 1 cutting field. All enemies in that field suffer +1d from all attacks from edged weapons.

World of Slashing Blades: Spend 3 Beats. Increase the area to range 5 burst 2, and all enemies treat the cutting field as dangerous terrain.
system.flavor: All at once a prayer and a spell. With an intercession to Gattalim, Pintakasi (Patron Saint Intercessor) of Blades, Makaubos allows his blades to circle around the target of your scorn, ready to bring them down.
